name: lecmii

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 → c0[C_H]c1)
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[C_H]c1
⊣ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

comment: Comparable Hilbert lattice elements commute. Theorem 2.3(iii) of [Beran] p. 40. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
